channel.title: Comments on: Gaining the Whole World, Forfeiting a Life

item.title: By: steve
item.dc:creator: steve
item.content:encoded:
That fool will be back when the burning crusade comes out…

Also, these stories are a diem a dozen… “oooo, wow almost destroyed my life /cry”
WoW doesn’t mess up ones life. the person playing the game makes a decision to play for 8 to 10 hours a day. Doing that is that persons fault. Not the game.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Waitaminute ... Blizzard would just replace me if I (ever) quit?? I .. I thought we had something special. Arrrrrrrrrrrrrrggggggg.
item.content:encoded: Waitaminute … Blizzard would just replace me if I (ever) quit?? I .. I thought we had something special. Arrrrrrrrrrrrrrggggggg.

item.title: By: VanHemlock
item.dc:creator: VanHemlock
item.description:
Good grief...I just read the whole thing...
Never seen the word 'pathetic' used so much in one place. Makes me proud to be a member of such a sympathetic subculture!
One gems though, about 400 posts down: http://www.ironhandunion.nl/raidspotting.png
I LOL'D cos it's true...
item.content:encoded:
Good grief…I just read the whole thing…

Never seen the word ‘pathetic’ used so much in one place. Makes me proud to be a member of such a sympathetic subculture!

One gems though, about 400 posts down: http://www.ironhandunion.nl/raidspotting.png

I LOL’D cos it’s true…

item.title: By: aaron
item.dc:creator: aaron
item.description: Good stuff, the type of things I like to bring up when people get pissed off about loot. I mean its loot... I myself, could technically work extra hours, buy gold, and buy items in less time than it would take to raid. But thats not the point. Good reads all around.
item.content:encoded:
Good stuff, the type of things I like to bring up when people get pissed off about loot. I mean its loot… I myself, could technically work extra hours, buy gold, and buy items in less time than it would take to raid. But thats not the point.
Good reads all around.
